titles.title: State Grain Fund Protection Act of 1988

A bill to amend the United States Warehouse Act to specifically allow States to require grain elevators with Federal warehouse licenses to participate in State grain indemnity funds or to require collateral security.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research, Gen. Leg.

bill.summary: 5/16/1988--Introduced. State Grain Fund Protection Act of 1988 - Amends the United States Warehouse Act to permit States to require federally licensed grain warehouses to participate in State grain indemnity funds or to require collateral security.
